mapper.select: select i.aptCode, i.apartmentName, ( concat(roadName, ' ', TRIM(LEADING '0' from roadNameBonbun), IF(TRIM(LEADING '0' from roadNameBubun) != '', CONCAT('-' , TRIM(LEADING '0' from roadNameBubun)), ''))) roadName, i.buildYear, i.lng, i.lat, ifnull(l.like_id, -1) like_id from houseinfo i left JOIN (SELECT * from houselike WHERE user_id = #{user_id} ) l ON i.aptCode = l.aptCode where i.dongCode = #{code} group by aptCode;

SELECT i.commercial_no, i.name, i.branch, i.info, i.roomNo, i.dongNo, i.floorNo, i.address, i.lat, i.lng from (select * from commercial where (6371 * acos( cos( radians(#{lat}) ) * cos( radians( `lat` ) ) * cos( radians( `lng` ) - radians(#{lng}) ) + sin( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians( `lat` ) ) ) ) <= 2) AS i WHERE i.info like CONCAT('%',#{info},'%')
select DISTINCT d.dealAmount, concat(d.dealYear,'.', d.dealMonth,'.', d.dealDay) date from housedeal d where d.aptCode = #{aptCode} and round(d.area) = #{area}
select DISTINCT round(area) area from housedeal where aptCode = #{aptCode} order by area
mapper.insert: insert into houselike (user_id, aptCode, register_time, ip_address) values(#{user_id}, #{aptCode}, now(), #{ip_address})
